ConvexAdam
==========

Overview
--------
ConvexAdam is a dual-optimization-based registration baseline integrated into
MIR. MIR includes ConvexAdam and ConvexAdam + VFA feature variants.

Key modules
-----------
- ``MIR.models.convexAdam``
- ``MIR.models.convexAdam.convex_adam_VFA``

Related tutorials
-----------------
- `LUMIR24 ConvexAdam <https://github.com/junyuchen245/MIR/tree/main/tutorials/lumir24_ConvexAdam>`_
- `autoPET ConvexAdam SPR <https://github.com/junyuchen245/MIR/tree/main/tutorials/autoPET_ConvexAdamSPR>`_
